revision.text: Possibly: The Family Preacher: Consisting of Practical Discourses for every Sunday throughout the Year: as also for Christmas-Day, Good-Friday, and other Solemn Occasions. The greater part originals never before printed. By D. Bellamy, M.A. Chaplain of Kew and Petersham in the County of Surrey. (Daniel Bellamy). 2v. (London : Printed for William Faden. For B. Law, No.13, Ave-Mary-Lane, MDCCLXXVI. [1776]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2412279~S1
